name: figma-sync
description: Tools to keep Figma designs and front-end code in sync

general.fileKey.description: The key for the file containing your design system

general.outFileName.description: (optional) The name of the file that will be generated.

fileInformation.tokensFrameName.description: The name of the frame containing the literal tokens

fileInformation.typographyFrameName.description: The name of the frame containing the text elments demonstrating the different typography styles

fileInformation.colorsFrameName.description: The name of the frame containing the color examples

fileInformation.framesWhiteList.description: (optional) A comma-separated list of frame names that will be output to the css. If no values are informed, all frames will be output.
